title: Flower of Reincarnation: 300 Years of Unrequited Love - Novel Updates
tags: Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Reincarnation   Unrequited Love
author: Mitsumi Rokusei   六青 みつみ
description:
Forgive me for hurting you with terrible words 

-- Rayland, a young aristocrat with memories of his previous life who killed his loved one.

Before that, Swen, a boy who looks just like his lover, appeared! 

I finally met someone I had been looking for, but somehow I couldn't take my eyes off his twin brother, Cain.

Why are you curious about Cain, who is plain and dull when he is not destined!?

 It's been 300 years of pure love that's been reborn in search of lost love!!*>
